scripts.test: cross-env TESTS_ENV=ui npm run config && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio config/wdio.chrome.headless.conf.js
scripts.multi: cross-env TESTS_ENV=ui npm run config && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio config/wdio.chrome.conf.js  --spec test/specs/Multiremote.spec.js
scripts.config: sh -ac 'if test "$TESTS_ENV"; then cp environments/env.${TESTS_ENV}.json.template environments/env.json; fi'
scripts.test:chrome:headless:ui: cross-env TESTS_ENV=ui npm run config && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio config/wdio.chrome.headless.conf.js
scripts.test:chrome:ui: cross-env TESTS_ENV=ui npm run config && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio config/wdio.chrome.conf.js  --spec test/specs/AddRemoveElement.spec.js
scripts.test:firefox:headless:ui: cross-env TESTS_ENV=ui npm run config && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio config/wdio.firefox.headless.conf.js
scripts.test:firefox:ui: cross-env TESTS_ENV=ui npm run config && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio config/wdio.firefox.conf.js --spec test/specs/BrokenImages.spec.js
scripts.test:edge:headless:ui: cross-env TESTS_ENV=ui npm run config && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio config/wdio.edge.headless.conf.js
scripts.test:edge:ui: cross-env TESTS_ENV=ui npm run config && ./node_modules/.bin/wdio config/wdio.edge.conf.js --spec test/specs/BrokenImages.spec.js
scripts.allure:serve:hi: npm run allure:history && npx allure serve allure-results
scripts.allure:generate:hi: npm run allure:history && npx allure generate allure-results --clean
